item.title: zsh
item.description: 安装oh-my-zsh sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/tools/install.sh)" 安装插件 进入oh-my-zsh插件库中 cd ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/plugins/ 下载插件（自动补全为例） git clone git://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions 其实插件名就是仓库名（zsh-aut
